titles.title: North Korea and Iran Sanctions Act
A bill to provide for the immediate reinstatement of sanctions against Iran if Iran attempts to acquire nuclear weapons technology from North Korea.
North Korea and Iran Sanctions Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
North Korea and Iran Sanctions Act
This bill requires the President to reinstate immediately all sanctions against Iran that were waived or suspended by the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (agreed to at Vienna July 14, 2015) if the Director of National Intelligence certifies that Iran has acquired, or is attempting to acquire, nuclear weapons technology from North Korea.
